other_tests.findings: The appendix is thickened to a diameter of 1.2 cm with a thick, hyperemic wall and surrounding fat stranding. There is no evidence of perforation. Incidental note of a splenule inferior to the main spleen. The spleen is mildly enlarged but otherwise unremarkable. Diverticula scattered along the large bowel without evidence of diverticulitis.
There were no specific findings reported from this procedure post-operatively.
